Orphapacket.Label: Painful legs and moving toes syndrome

TextSection.Contents: A rare neurologic (adult-onset) movement disorder characterized by persistent pain (unilateral or bilateral) in the feet or legs (most commonly the hemi-lower limbs) and persistant twisting non-rhythmic involuntary movements of one or more toes. Chronic "deep aching pulling pain" includes tingling numbness aching dullness cramp shooting sharp burning and prickling.
